text: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_155752

text: To fight and conquer in all our battles is not supreme excellence; supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_133291

text: He will win who knows when to fight and when not to fight.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_717951

text: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_383158

text: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_387509

text: If fighting is sure to result in victory, than you must fight, even though the ruler forbid it; if fighting will not result in victory, then you must not fight even at the ruler's bidding.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_440735

text: All men can see these tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out of which victory is evolved.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_155751

text: Be extremely subtle, even to the point of formlessness. Be extremely mysterious, even to the point of soundlessness. Thereby you can be the director of the opponent's fate.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_401677

text: Know thy self, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_384112

text: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him; not on the chance of his not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_751632

text: Regard your soldiers as your children, and they will follow you into the deepest valleys; look on them as your own beloved sons, and they will stand by you even unto death.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_402522

text: There is no instance of a nation benefitting from prolonged warfare.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_109632

text: For to win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the acme of skill. To subdue the enemy without fighting is the acme of skill.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_138179

text: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_384542

text: Hence the saying: If you know the enemy and you know yourself, your victory will not stand in doubt; if you know Heaven and you know Earth, you may make your victory complete.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_440736

text: Thus, what is of supreme importance in war is to attack the enemy's strategy.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_138180

text: Pretend inferiority and encourage his arrogance.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_138178

text: Thus it is that in war the victorious strategist only seeks battle after the victory has been won, whereas he who is destined to defeat first fights and afterwards looks for victory.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_123501

text: The general who wins the battle makes many calculations in his temple before the battle is fought. The general who loses makes but few calculations beforehand.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_129855

text: The quality of decision is like the well-timed swoop of a falcon which enables it to strike and destroy its victim.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_155748

text: The general who advances without coveting fame and retreats without fearing disgrace, whose only thought is to protect his country and do good service for his sovereign, is the jewel of the kingdom.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_155754

text: Know your enemy and know yourself and you can fight a hundred battles without disaster.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_385644

text: The art of war is of vital importance to the state. It is a matter of life and death, a road either to safety or to ruin. Hence it is a subject of inquiry which can on no account be neglected.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_717950

text: He who knows when he can fight and when he cannot, will be victorious.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_383904

text: If ignorant both of your enemy and yourself, you are certain to be in peril.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_384543

text: The opportunity to secure ourselves against defeat lies in our own hands, but the opportunity of defeating the enemy is provided by the enemy himself.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_398639

text: Confront them with annihilation, and they will then survive; plunge them into a deadly situation, and they will then live. When people fall into danger, they are then able to strive for victory.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_402344

text: He who is prudent and lies in wait for an enemy who is not, will be victorious.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_384831

text: If your opponent is of choleric temper, irritate him.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_717952

text: Quickness is the essence of the war.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_103725

text: If you are far from the enemy, make him believe you are near.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_382933

text: Secret operations are essential in war; upon them the army relies to make its every move.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_138184

text: To see victory only when it is within the ken of the common herd is not the acme of excellence.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_163248

text: Supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_384922

text: Now the reason the enlightened prince and the wise general conquer the enemy whenever they move and their achievements surpass those of ordinary men is foreknowledge.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_138151

text: The good fighters of old first put themselves beyond the possibility of defeat, and then waited for an opportunity of defeating the enemy.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_123498

text: When envoys are sent with compliments in their mouths, it is a sign that the enemy wishes for a truce.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_165822

text: There has never been a protracted war from which a country has benefited.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_384215

text: Balk the enemy's power; force him to reveal himself.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_710971

text: A good commander is benevolent and unconcerned with fame.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_710972

text: The enlightened ruler is heedful, and the good general full of caution.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_384006

text: It is essential to seek out enemy agents who have come to conduct espionage against you and to bribe them to serve you. Give them instructions and care for them. Thus doubled agents are recruited and used.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_138182

text: Prohibit the taking of omens, and do away with superstitious doubts. Then, until death itself comes, no calamity need be feared.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_391328

text: He will win whose army is animated by the same spirit throughout all its ranks.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_710969

text: If our soldiers are not overburdened with money, it is not because they have a distaste for riches; if their lives are not unduly long, it is not because they are disinclined to longevity.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_155747

text: Victory usually goes to the army who has better trained officers and men.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_710970

text: In the practical art of war, the best thing of all is to take the enemy's country whole and intact; to shatter and destroy it is not so good.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_393466

text: Hence that general is skilful in attack whose opponent does not know what to defend; and he is skilful in defense whose opponent does not know what to attack.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_399627

text: He will win who knows how to handle both superior and inferior forces.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_710968

text: For them to perceive the advantage of defeating the enemy, they must also have their rewards.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_386182

text: It is only the enlightened ruler and the wise general who will use the highest intelligence of the army for the purposes of spying, and thereby they achieve great results.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_402086

text: Of all those in the army close to the commander none is more intimate than the secret agent; of all rewards none more liberal than those given to secret agents; of all matters none is more confidential than those relating to secret operations.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_138181

text: If we know that our own men are in a condition to attack, but are unaware that the enemy is not open to attack, we have gone only halfway towards victory.
author: Sun Tzu
citation: "Sun Tzu Quotes." BrainyQuote.com. BrainyMedia Inc, 2021. 1 March 2021. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/sun_tzu_440737
